pages.name: page1

elements.name: question1
elements.title: Did you complete this study in a place free from distraction?

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Were there any distractions that took place during this experiment?

elements.name: question3
elements.title: If yes, please describe the distractions

elements.name: question4
elements.title: Were you wearing headphones that played sound (music, podcast, another person) during this experiment?

elements.name: question5
elements.title: Did you leave the device administering the experiment at any point?

elements.name: question6
elements.title: Did you leave the web-page at any point?

elements.name: question7
elements.title: Did you multi-task as you completed this study? This includes opening separate tabs, using your phone, talking to other people, etc.

elements.name: question8
elements.title: If yes, please describe your multi-tasking activities.

elements.name: question9
elements.title: What device did you complete the study on?

pages.title: Your responses are completely anonymous and your answers to these questions will NOT affect your compensation. Please be completely honest.
